quest.name: Two-star Veteran Clan Hunt
journal: Estrild of the Shiokaze Hostelry continues to keep a close, enlisting eye on passersby.

dialogue.name: ESTRILD
dialogue.text: Gods be good! It is not every day I see one as strong as you pass by. I am Estrild, of Clan Centurio, and I invite you to take part on our Hunt!

dialogue.name: ESTRILD
dialogue.text: Ahhh, but I know your face. Aye, aye, you are the firebrand. The one whose ways have kept herhim from rising through our ranks. Forename, was it not?

dialogue.name: ESTRILD
dialogue.text: It has been some while since last we met. Your eyes have changed, and that for the better. I'd venture you've had your share of grazes with death since then.

dialogue.name: ESTRILD
dialogue.text: Aye, the one-star bills are no longer fit for you. Go and speak with Wlveva. See if the Clan will not issue you bills more suited to one of your abilities. For as the hunter grows, so too must the hunt!

dialogue.name: WLVEVA
dialogue.text: You must be Forename. Estrild told me to expect you. She mentioned it was time you tried your hand at a second star.

dialogue.name: WLVEVA
dialogue.text: It would seem she's taken quite a liking to you. And rightly so. Estrild has always fawned on strong womenmen. I suppose there's no faulting her for that.

dialogue.name: WLVEVA
dialogue.text: So be it. I will see to it our two-stars are at your disposal. But you would do well to know the difficulty will be far greater than one-star hunts you've seen. Prepare yourself.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Two-star Veteran Clan mark bills are now available.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are now able to undertake two-star Veteran Clan mark bills from the Clan Hunt boards in Kugane and Rhalgr's Reach.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: New quests and three-star Veteran Clan mark bills will become available from Estrild at the Shiokaze Hostelry upon reaching level 66.

dialogue.name: ESTRILD
dialogue.text: See if the Clan will not issue you bills more suited to one of your abilities. For as the hunter grows, so too must the hunt!
